channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16109] Add Interface audience annotation to a few classes
item.description:
The following classes miss Interface audience:

FlushNonSloppyStoresFirstPolicy
FlushAllLargeStoresPolicy
MemStoreCompactor

This JIRA adds Interface audience to these classes.
item.summary: Add Interface audience annotation to a few classes

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Flush policies are config options, let's mark those with: 


@InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(HBaseInterfaceAudience.CONFIG)

-1 overall
